movies.name: Gran Torin
movies.description: Disgruntled Korean War veteran Walt Kowalski sets out to reform his neighbor, Thao Lor, a Hmong teenager who tried to steal Kowalski's prized possession: a 1972 Gran Torino.

movies.name: Treasure P
movies.description: A Disney animated version of "Treasure Island". The only difference is that the film is set in outer space with alien worlds and other galactic wonders.

movies.name: Memento
movies.description: A man with short-term memory loss attempts to track down his wife's murderer.

movies.name: Ad Astra
movies.description: Astronaut Roy McBride undertakes a mission across an unforgiving solar system to uncover the truth about his missing father and his doomed expedition that now, 30 years later, threatens the universe.

movies.name: Alita
movies.description: A deactivated cyborg is revived, but cannot remember anything of her past life and goes on a quest to find out who she is.

movies.name: Black P
movies.description: T'Challa, heir to the hidden but advanced kingdom of Wakanda, must step forward to lead his people into a new future and must confront a challenger from his country's past.

movies.name: The Score
movies.description: An aging thief hopes to retire and live off his ill-gotten wealth when a young kid convinces him into doing one last heist.

movies.name: The Game
movies.description: After a wealthy banker is given an opportunity to participate in a mysterious game, his life is turned upside down when he becomes unable to distinguish between the game and reality.

movies.name: NATM
movies.description: A sendup of all the teen movies that have accumulated in the past two decades.

movies.name: Hollywood
movies.description: A faded television actor and his stunt double strive to achieve fame and success in the film industry during the final years of Hollywood's Golden Age in 1969 Los Angeles.

movies.name: Star Wars
movies.description: Two Jedi escape a hostile blockade to find allies and come across a young boy who may bring balance to the Force, but the long dormant Sith resurface to claim their old glory.

movies.name: Popes
movies.description: Behind Vatican walls, the conservative Pope Benedict and the liberal future Pope Francis must find common ground to forge a new path for the Catholic Church.

movies.name: FordFerari
movies.description: American car designer Carroll Shelby and driver Ken Miles battle corporate interference, the laws of physics and their own personal demons to build a revolutionary race car for Ford and challenge Ferrari at the 24 Hours of Le Mans in 1966.
